org.team751.cheesy.util

Class AccelFilterBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.team751.cheesy.util.AccelFilterBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContinuousAccelFilter

    public abstract class AccelFilterBase
extends Object
    A basic interface for different acceleration profiles. Calculates the kinematic physics of a system by determining distance remaining and maximum, intended, and current velocity and acceleration.

      • CalcSystem

        public abstract void CalcSystem(double distance_to_target,
              double v,
              double goal_v,
              double max_a,
              double max_v,
              double dt)
        Recalculate the system
        Parameters:
        distance_to_target - The distance from the current position to the target position
        v - The current velocity
        goal_v - The target velocity
        max_a - The maximum acceleration that should be used
        max_v - The maximum velocity that should be used
        dt - The change in time between this call and the most recent call to the same method

        Parameters:
